amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 111-9 to strike funding for Amtrak.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 111-9 to strike funding for Amtrak.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 116 - 320 (Roll no. 43).
